official_title: A bill directing the Secretary of the Interior to include in the National Register the covered bridges within the Commonwealth of Kentucky.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to include in the National Register the covered historical bridges within the Commonwealth of Kentucky.

titles.title: A bill directing the Secretary of the Interior to include in the National Register the covered bridges within the Commonwealth of Kentucky.
